title: Firewall/Crash bug
body: this shit is getting unreal, not letting me into game over and over pretty sure this is server side fix asap thx

replies.body: We're investigating an issue that may be giving a firewall error at the moment - check out[ this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.
